profile.name: Priyanath Maji
profile.title: Senior Technology Architect
profile.bio: Building scalable AI/ML platforms and distributed systems. Passionate about applying emerging technologies to solve complex problems at scale.

whatIDo.title: AI/ML Platforms
whatIDo.description: Building LLM-based systems with RLHF fine-tuning, RAG architectures, and vector databases for personalized recommendations and conversational AI.

whatIDo.title: Distributed Systems
whatIDo.description: Designing scalable API platforms with distributed caching, async processing, auto-scaling, and real-time event-driven architectures.

projects.title: AI-Powered Wellness Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed recommendation system leveraging LLMs fine-tuned with RLHF, conversational AI chat interface, and vector knowledge database for RAG.

projects.title: FHIR-Based API Integration Platform
projects.description: Architected scalable platform enabling real-time communication between EHR systems and insurance payors. Implemented distributed caching, async request handling, auto-scaling, and database replication with OAuth 2.0 and TLS encryption.

projects.title: Banking Customer Enquiry Classification
projects.description: Developed ML classification model using logistic regression and scikit-learn to categorize banking enquiries. Deployed via Azure Machine Learning.
projects.result: 60% productivity increase, 80% reduction in turnaround time.

projects.title: Problem Management Analytics Solution
projects.description: Engineered end-to-end solution automating ServiceNow ticket categorization via ML pipelines using NLP tools including SpaCy and Stanford NLP.
projects.result: 92% accuracy, 65% reduction in manual triage time.

certifications.title: XCS224n: Natural Language Processing with Deep Learning

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication
education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology, Ranchi, India
education.details: Graduated with First Class Honors. Relevant coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Computer Networks, Digital Signal Processing.

publications.title: Study of EDFA Characteristics using Genetic Algorithm
publications.venue: Photonics-2000, International Conference on Fiber Optics and Photonics
publications.description: Research internship applying Genetic Algorithms to Fiber Optics. Published in conference proceedings, Calcutta, pp 1081-1084.
